# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of quality and functionality that truly sets it apart. Given its unparalleled features, I believe it's worth more than $80 to you. To secure this opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $120. I trust that you will find the value proposition irresistible. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in excellence. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
